title: Welcome to Super Save-A-Bunch.
description: ˈwɛlkəm tu ˈsupər seɪv-ə-bʌnʧ.

title: Hi. I'm looking for that thick, translucent plastic sheeting ... the kind they hang in front of the doors of walk-in refrigerators.
segments: in front of the doors of
description: haɪ. aɪm ˈlʊkɪŋ fɔr ðæt θɪk,trænˈslusənt ˈplæstɪk ˈʃitɪŋ ... ðə kaɪnd ðeɪ hæŋ ɪn frʌnt ʌv ðə dɔrz ʌv wɔk-ɪn rɪˈfrɪʤəˌreɪtərz.

title: Uh ... we don't sell that here. You could try Home Depot.
description: ʌ ... wi doʊnt sɛl ðæt hir. ju kʊd traɪ hoʊm ˈdipoʊ.

title: I tried them already. They sent me here.
description: aɪ traɪd ðɛm ɔlˈrɛdi. ðeɪ sɛnt mi hir.

title: Now, I cannot believe you don't have that stuff. Oh, I don't even know what it's called!
description: naʊ, aɪ ˈkænɑt bɪˈliv ju doʊnt hæv ðæt stʌf. oʊ, aɪ doʊnt ˈivɪn noʊ wɑt ɪts kɔld!

title: Sorry.
description: ˈsɑri.

title: Well, you're supposed to have everything!

title: Well, we don't have that stuff ... that you don't even know what it's called!
description: wɛl, wi doʊnt hæv ðæt stʌf ... ðæt ju doʊnt ˈivɪn noʊ wɑt ɪts kɔld!

title: Your website says that this is the most well-stocked store in five parishes! Now, I just drove over an hour from Marthaville ...

description: jʊər ˈwɛbˌsaɪt sɛz ðæt ðɪs ɪz ðə moʊst wɛl-stɑkt stɔr ɪn faɪv ˈpærɪʃɪz! naʊ, aɪ ʤʌst droʊv ˈoʊvər ən ˈaʊər frʌm Marthaville ...

title: Well, I suppose it does, but...
description: wɛl, aɪ səˈpoʊz ɪt dʌz, bʌt...

we stocked whatever the hell it is

title: Well, I think that if a business chooses to classify itself as ...

title: Why didn't you just find it on-line and have it delivered to your house? Or were you just looking for an excuse to wear them ugly-ass clothes?
